title: 1-Hour Epic Music Mix | Best of C21 FX - Power of Epic Music - Full Mix
description: 1-Hour filled with amazing tracks from C21FX, they are breathing new life into the epic music genre so if you like this kind of genre you should definitley check it out! Music by C21 FX Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/C21FX Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/c21fx Licensing: chrisbragg@cabin21sound.com _ Tracklist: 00:00 Life without sense - Christopher P.
